name: Troll Kart - Version 1.2
description:
Troll Kart - Faq

Version 1.0: First version, created in just 4 hours for a game jam - Released 04/04/2020

Versão 1.1: Focused on improving gameplay and game design - Released on 10/04/2020

Versão 1.2 (finale): Focused on improving graphics and audio - Released on 18/04/2020

Here is the faq for version 1.2 (finale version):

+ Nem menu;

+ New logo;

+ Add menu music;

+ Add menu confirm sound;

+ Add specific pages for how to play and credits;

+ Add new sound when the player collect the meats;

+ The stage theme (BattleTroll) have extended;

+ New sprites for: Player, edge spikes, mini walking spikes and meat.
